O

onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
Check the validity of fields before enabling the appointment to be saved.
onActionAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
Checks the validitiy of datas and redirects back to main screen if all fields are valid.
onActionCancelAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
Method to cancel appointment.
onActionCancelAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
Method that will redirect to main screen if cancel add is initiated.
onActionCancelUpdate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
When cancel update is initiated, redirects to appointments screen.
onActionCancelUpdate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
When cancel is initiated, redirects to customer screen.
onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
Deletes an appointment from the database.
onActionDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomersController
Deletes a customer from the database.
onActionDivision(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
Method that determines the content of the division based on label and combo-box that will populate it after (all based on the selection).
onActionDivision(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
Determines the content of the divisions label and populates the divisions combo-box, all based on the country combo-box selection.
onActionExitApplication(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginController
Exits the application.
onActionGoToAddAppointmentScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
The method that sends the user to the add appointments screen.
onActionGoToAddCustomerScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomersController
Sends the user to the add customer screen.
onActionGoToMainMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
The method that sends the user back to main screen.
onActionGoToMainMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomersController
Sends the user to the Main Menu screen.
onActionGoToMainMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewReportsController
The method that will send the user back to main menu.
onActionGoToUpdateAppointmentScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
The Method that sends the user to the update appointment screen.
onActionGoToUpdateCustomerScreen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomersController
Sends the user to the update customer screen.
onActionLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginController
This method authenticates the user name and password, and tracks the user activity by recording user login attempts to a text file.
onActionLogout(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
When the user logs out, will direct back to the main menu screen.
onActionRunReport1(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewReportsController
Runs the first rounds of reports and displays the number of appointments by distinct month and type.
onActionRunReport2(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewReportsController
Runs the second report.
onActionRunReport3(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewReportsController
Runs the third reports that will display the total number of appointments stored in the database.
onActionUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
Checks the validity of fields/data first before saving the appointment inside the database.
onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
Validates field before a customer can be updated into the data base.
onActionViewAll(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
Shows all appointments in the table/database.
onActionViewAppointments(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
The method that will open appointments at the event the method is clicked.
onActionViewByMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
Shows current month appointments in the table/database.
onActionViewByWeek(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewAppointmentsController
Shows current week appointments in the table/database.
onActionViewCustomers(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
When the method is initiated, sends the user to the customer screen section.
onActionViewReports(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
When the method is initiated, sends the user to the report screen section.
onMouseClickFillCustomerTextField(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
Fills the customer id text field based on a selected customer in the table.
onMouseClickFillCustomerTextField(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
Fills the customer id text field from a selected customer in the table.
onPressEnterKeyLogin(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginController
Method that authenticates the user name and password(When enter key is pressed rather than clicked).
openConnection() - Static method in class utilities.DBConnection
The method to start the connection with the database.
